name: Samuel Witwer

detail:
山姆·威特沃（Sam Witwer），1977年出生于美国伊利诺伊州格伦，演员。
山姆·威特沃在超人前传中饰演饰演Davis Bloome/Doomsday（戴维斯·布鲁姆/毁灭日），初登场于第八季第2集。同时还为星球大战系列电影改编的游戏星球大战：原力释放和星球大战：原力释放2中的弑星者提供人物塑模。

Samuel Stewart "Sam" Witwer (born October 20, 1977) is an American actor and musician. He has portrayed Crashdown in Battlestar Galactica, Davis Bloome in Smallville, and vampire Aidan Waite of the US/Canadian remake of BBC's supernatural drama series Being Human on Syfy in the US and Space in Canada. He also voiced protagonist Galen Marek/Starkiller in the multimedia project Star Wars: The Force Unleashed, as well as The Son and Darth Maul in Cartoon Network's Star Wars: The Clone Wars and Emperor Palpatine as well as Maul in Disney XD's Star Wars Rebels.
